Title: Repeals subdivision 6 of section 420.10 of the criminal procedure law, relating to the ability of a sentencing court to reduce a restitution order in a criminal sentence to a civil judgment
Summary: Relates to the ability of a sentencing court to reduce a restitution order in a criminal sentence to a civil judgment; makes conforming changes.
LawCode: Rpld ยง420.10 sub 6, CP L; amd ยง60.27, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to repeal subdivision 6 of section 420.10 of the criminal procedure law, relating to the ability of a sentencing court to reduce a restitution order in a criminal sentence to a civil judgement; and to amend the penal law, in relation to making conforming changes
